overview.en: DEFIS (Decentralized Financial System) is built on top of the cryptographic primitives. Owners of different cryptocurrencies can earn interest, borrow, exchange, and create custom cryptocurrencies on DEFIS all in a completely decentralized and anonymous manner.
overview.zh: DEFIS是一个去中心化金融系统，可扩展，面向隐私的脱链智能合约和金融协议建立在加密基础之上。不同类型的加密货币和资产的所有者可以在DEFIS系统中获得利息，以去中心化模式借用，交换和创建自定义加密货币。
